properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas California out to 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 2:55AM PST until February 3 at 8:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras
Blancas California out to 10 nm.

* WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
